segments.text: Have you been to Shanghai before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I have . I ’ Ve been there three times in the past year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds great . Have you been to the top of the Pearl Tower ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No I haven ’ t . I haven ’ t visited the Bund either . I ’ Ve always had too much work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you haven ’ t done much then , in Shanghai ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I ’ Ve eaten soup dumplings in a lovely restaurant on Nanjing Lu . They were delicious !
segments.speaker: S2
